abstract member Send : string * seq<string> * string * Azure.Communication.Sms.SmsSendOptions * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> Azure.Response<System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList<Azure.Communication.Sms.SmsSendResult>> override this.Send : string * seq<string> * string * Azure.Communication.Sms.SmsSendOptions * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> Azure.Response<System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList<Azure.Communication.Sms.SmsSendResult>>

Docs.param: The sender's phone number in E.164 format that is owned by the authenticated account.
The recipient's phone number in E.164 format. In this version, up to 100 recipients in the list is supported.
The contents of the message that will be sent to the recipient. The allowable content is defined by RFC 5724.
Optional configuration for sending SMS messages.
The cancellation token to use.
Docs.summary: Sends an SMS message from a phone number that belongs to the authenticated account.
Docs.exception: The server returned an error. See for details returned from the server.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Azure.Response`1<class Azure.Communication.Sms.SmsSendResult> Send(string from, string to, string message, class Azure.Communication.Sms.SmsSendOptions options, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

Docs.param: The sender's phone number that is owned by the authenticated account.
The recipient's phone number.

The contents of the message that will be sent to the recipient. The allowable content is defined by RFC 5724. If the message has more than 160 characters, the server will split it into multiple SMSs automatically.
Optional configuration for sending SMS messages.
The cancellation token for the underlying request.
Docs.summary: Sends a SMS a phone number that is acquired by the authenticated account, another phone number.
Docs.exception: The server returned an error. See for details returned from the server.
